Question.Subject: cant find files i downloaded with firefox?
Question.Content: i have mozilla firefox i downloaded a movie and they always go to firefox download after they are finish downloading i dont know were they go does anybosy have any idea were they might go sorry everybody i dont need help anymore i found them
Question.ChosenAnswer: Search your entire harddrive for the file using search function in your pc. U should have used a downlaod manager when downlaoding a huge file like Flashget, etc. XD

Answer.Content: Search your entire harddrive for the file using search function in your pc. U should have used a downlaod manager when downlaoding a huge file like Flashget, etc. XD
Open firefox downloads manager: Tools->Download or use Ctrl + J. right click your downloaded file, select Open Containing Folder.
